name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg: The Vietnamese government plans to implement large-scale institutional streamlining and civil service reduction measures.
According to Decree No. 178/2024/NĐ-CP, promulgated by the Vietnamese government on December 31, 2024 and effective on January 1, 2025, the number of public servants who receive salaries from the state treasury is planned to be reduced by at least 20%.
Specifically, Vietnam plans to abolish five cabinet departments and merge departments such as finance, planning and investment. In addition, four government agencies such as the State Capital Management Committee will be abolished. This will reduce the number of government agencies from 30 to 21.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 13, People's Daily: "Three cents a piece of aspirin" can also make a profit. Coupled with strict external supervision, there is no reason to reduce the quality.
Netizen: "Then let the leaders take it first" "The high-ranking cadres' wards also take these drugs, so I believe it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the Foreign Ministry press conference, the Ukrainian News Agency asked: What is the Foreign Ministry's comment on Ukraine's capture of North Korean soldiers on the Russian battlefield, which proves that North Korea was directly involved in the war and violated the Security Council's sanctions against North Korea?

The Foreign Ministry spokesman said: "I am not aware of the relevant situation you mentioned"

"China's position on the Ukrainian crisis is consistent and clear. We hope that all parties will promote easing of the situation and commit to a political solution."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 12, Shanghai. A child holds a microphone and sings the national anthem

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 13, a Chinese soldier named "Pai Zong" who joined the Russian army said in a live broadcast that Russian soldiers ganged up on him and made him do odd jobs like chopping wood and fetching water, while Russian soldiers did nothing every day and just lay down and played with their phones. Pai Zong said he had been forced into a corner and was ready to die with the Russians. "I'm going to throw grenades at them and shoot all the commanders. Then you'll see on the news that a Chinese killed more than a dozen Russians."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 13, Caixin reported that according to UN data, there are hundreds of thousands of fraudulent employees in Southeast Asia, with 220,000 in Myanmar and Cambodia alone. We believe that most of them are Chinese citizens or ethnic Chinese.
We need to reflect: Why are citizens of the world's second most powerful country the biggest victims, rather than Koreans, Japanese, Greeks, and Argentinians?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 14 (Release) A suicide note from a Fuzhou University student was circulated online. In the note, he said that he had never felt the love of his family since he was a child, no one cared when he was sick, and his parents forced him to repeat his senior year in high school. When he was in college, he interned in an electronics factory, worked until midnight without overtime pay, and was fired by his boss because of complaints.
He said that he had no way out, he could not graduate because he did not have enough credits, and all the suffering he had endured in his life was for a graduation certificate. "I also want to rent a car and find out the time when my enemy's children get out of school, but if there is no hell, everything is empty after death, what is the point of revenge, if there is hell, wouldn't it be better to do good?"
